channel.title: Adding A Working Link
channel.description:
I've seen it on server's before, where they have a working link upon logging that says:
VISIT THE FORUMS HERE: ASLFKJSKLGJKLSJGLSGJDKL.COM , but when you click the link, a website loads in your default browser, what's the code for that? I've been browsing sources so far I found one, but he removed it.
Recap, making a link click-able in a chatbox on an rsps.

item.title: Adding A Working Link
item.dc:creator: @killerj012 killerj012
item.description:
